Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1967...
Injured on 5/7/1967 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 5/18/1971...
Injured on 6/26/1973 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/4/1977 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 5/30/1979 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 7/11/1979 with a Spasms Back, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/2/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Released by Minnesota on 2/5/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/22/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $3,700,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/8/1983 to a 2-year deal worth $2,420,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/15/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,685,858 per year...
Drafted in 5th round, 88th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1987...
Injured on 5/7/1987 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/27/1989 with a Bruised Foot, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/21/1993 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1997, off Shane Reynolds (CHC)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/30/1997, off Julio Valera (LA)...
